title: 3 and Out - Middlekauff's Weekend Mailbag: Deshaun Watson Market, Mac Jones Ceiling, Weak QB Class
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Middlekauff's Weekend Mailbag: Deshaun Watson Market, Mac Jones Ceiling, Weak QB Class
description:
John answers listener questions in his weekend Mailbag, including if teams will be willing to deal for Deshaun Watson despite pending legal issues, where Mac Jones' ceiling stops, an inside look at how an NFL trade gets done, and why this QB draft class is so much weaker than recent classes.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
